features: 🌱 Oil-Free Matte Moisturizer: Moisture Matte is a gentle lightweight moisturizer for normal, oily & acne-prone skin. It's oil-free & is quickly absorbs into the skin, helps reduce redness & swelling, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth & hydrated. It leaves no shine or greasy feeling & won't cause pimples. Professional-Grade. Natural. Cruelty-Free. Vegan. Made in USA

🌱The Power of Our Ingredients: This innovative formula starts with 64% Hydroponically Grown Aloe Vera with Vit-B5, Zinc, Magnesium, Elder Tree, Cucumber, Mallow, Ivy, Pellitory Walls, Arnica, and more to help soothe, hydrate & diminish acne-prone side-effects like redness & swelling. This non-irritating formula is also a perfect after-shave moisturizer.

🌱Balancing Skin Tone: Moisture Matte helps achieve the ideal moisture balance for a healthy complexion with the botanical nourishment and oil-free hydration of organic aloe vera, cucumber, and more. It’s quickly absorbed, leaving no greasy residue or shine. Don’t wait; try it today and feel the difference!

🌱For All Skin Types. Unisex: Use on face, neck & body. Formulated for all skin types, sensitive & acne-prone. Gently massage into skin; use night & day or as needed. -Since 1987, we have prided ourselves on delivering honest and effective solutions to help you achieve healthy, clear, glowing skin with our plant-based, professional-grade, small-batch skincare products. LEROSETT by Gunilla of Sweden has been trusted by dermatologists & estheticians for over 30 years.

🌱100% Satisfaction Guaranteed: Worry free, we offer a 90-day money-back guarantee. Plant-based, ethically sourced skincre. No parabens, alcohol, petroleum, dyes, sulfates, silicone, paraffin, phthalates, astringents, oils, benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid, animal ingredients or artificial fragrance.-Leaping Bunny Certified and WBENC-Certified Women-Owned Business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite facial moisturizer so far
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't leave any oily residue like some of my other moisturizers. Hasn't caused any breakouts, yay. Works great for my sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product.1. The product is clean not full of a bunch of toxic ingredients.2. It leaves no greasy residue.3. It absorbs right into the skin leaving you feeling very moisturized.4. You can use it all over your body plus your face so all in one.5. Great price.I am sold and will be using this from now on :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer for sensitive and oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this moisturizer for about half a year now. I like it because it doesn't have a strong scent and feels light on the skin yet moisturizing. It's not irritating to the skin and doesn't make my face oily. It may be a little bit too light on the winter so I apply a little bit more during winter season and it works just fine. A minor complaint is the printing on the moisturizer. I like to clean my skincare products with an alcohol wipe bi-weekly to keep them clean in humid areas like bathroom and this is the only product that bleeds ink when I clean it. Maybe try a different printing method or ink? Other than that, the product itself is great so if you have sensitive/oily skin, I suggest you give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great non oily moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for making cruelty free products that are high quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product goes on fine and feels ok, the reason for 3 stars is because of how tiny it is, which is a bit annoying since I use moisturizer so often

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Oily Skin
reviews.reviewText: After spending a fortune on so-called oil-free moisturizers, I hit the jack pot with this one. No irritants on my sensitive skin. Goes on smoothly. My skin feels soft & hydrated. Makeup stays matte until I take it off. Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer combo skin
reviews.reviewText: I would absolutely give this moisturizer a 10/10 it is the first moisturizer that I have found that doesn’t make me break out, doesn’t make my skin oily after one hour of putting it on and doesn’t irritate my skin. My skin is extremely sensitive to skincare products even the ones that specify in being for sensitive skin so for this moisturizer not to irritate it not one bit is very impressive. The only downside is the price to get a bigger size but besides that DEFINITELY would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is likely very good for oily skin. It's a little too light for my acne prone combination and mature skin in winter, but I'll try it again when it's more humid.
